item.title: This Simple Trick Will Have You Setting Up a New Google Account in No Time!
item.description: Introduction Are you looking to set up a new Google Account? It’s easier than you think! In this blog post, we’ll walk you through the simple steps to get you up and running in no time. Steps to Setting Up a Google Account Go to the Google homepage and click the “Sign In” button in the top right corner. Click the “Create Account” button. Enter your name, email address, and a password.
